Uses of Class
tophersmith.security.headers.util.InvalidHeaderException

  • Packages that use InvalidHeaderException 
    Package Description
    tophersmith.security.headers.impl  

    • Uses of InvalidHeaderException in tophersmith.security.headers.impl

      Methods in tophersmith.security.headers.impl that throw InvalidHeaderException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void XXSSProtectionHeader.validate()
      The report URL, if set, must be valid and if protection is enabled but block or reporting is set
      void XFrameOptionsHeader.validate()
      If Allow-From is used, a valid origin must also be set
      void StrictTransportSecurityHeader.validate()
      max-age must be set and contain non-negative numbers
      void ContentSecurityPolicyHeader.validate()
      validation is dispatched to ContentSecurityPolicy.isValid()
      abstract void AbstractHeader.validate()
      ensure all header values are set correctly individually or in combination.
      void XContentTypeOptionsHeader.validate()
      Impossible to fail since there are no options to set
